Its capital is the town of Biltine. ==Subdivisions== The region of Wadi Fira is divided into three departments. Each is listed with the name of its capital or main town and a list of sub-prefectures. Department Capital Sub-prefectures Biltine Biltine Am Zoer, Arada, Biltine, Mata Dar Tama Guéréda Guéréda, Kolonga, Sirim Birke Kobé Iriba Iriba, Matadjana, Tiné Djagaraba ==References== Category:Regions of Chad
